We’re a core team of talented engineers and designers with over 35 years of combined experience in the web and mobile space.

Our small and passionate start-up is growing. If you're a self-starter, would love to be part of a growing start-up and have what it takes to get things done, we’d like to hear from you.

ul.li: William Shakour Originally from Sudan, William has written code for a large variety of devices and platforms - ranging from phones to servers and everything in-between. When he is not making sense of app data he loves to write mobile games.

Gustaf Leksell Before founding Reflection, Gustaf led Business Development for Games at BBC Worldwide. He has lived and worked in Seoul, Shanghai and Austin where he designed & produced successful mobile and online games.
Chi Dire Chi has more than 20 years experience coding apps and services for small to global brands. With more than 600 apps across his devices, he thought it was time to try and make sense of it all.
